channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Starts Sharing All Your Text Messages With Your Employer
item.description: Warning — what happens on your Android phone, doesn’t stay on your Android phone.

item.title: ‘Petal Runner’ Is A Cozy Indie Game Boy-Like Coming In 2026
item.description: Petal Runner is a cozy looking Game Boy-style indie game made by a small team that's loaded with charm and personality.
